row.process: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_BCKFILES@UNIX if [ "$FILE_COUNT" -ne 0 ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Backup files already exists, apporting." : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR exit 1 fi :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Creating backup now, this can take a while" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO :SET &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# = "select * from analytics_datastore_backup_before('&date_before_with_tz#','&ANALYTICS_BACKUP_BASE_FILENAME#');" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PRV.INCLUDE.PSQL_EXCUTE@UNIX :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_BCKFILES@UNIX if [ "$FILE_COUNT" -ne &ANALYTICS_TABLES_LEN# ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Not all backup files found! Stopping now." : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR exit 1 fi :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Backup created files for all tables with the following base name: &ANALYTICS_BACKUP_BASE_FILENAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
